title: Infinite Pixels--Alpha 0.2.0
description:
Infinite Pixels v0.2.0

From frozennightmare.com:

"In this update we have done some real drastic changes to the game, first say goodbye to the dead and pointless planets the game used to have. Now we are inclining for a way more blocky look, but for a real  good reason.  We have added lots of locations, towns and stories to explore, we are finally making that exploration game we were looking forward to do.

The Ã¢â‚¬Å“planetsÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ still have circular gravity plus a day and night cycle. Sure now they are way blockier but they also feel much more alive with all the things to explore and learn. We are planning to add way more locations, towns , and stories and more planets obviously.

We also worked on the UIÃ¢â‚¬Â¦. alot

As new updates come out the gameÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s universe is going to be getting bigger and bigger with more everything!. We hope you enjoy this new update."

Enjoy, seed, and remember to buy the game!23
